subject: RE: 148975 - [Type 3] Broker 4 vs. CGML : Margin Notice, Portfolio Statement
content:
Dear Sir/Madam, 

We see exposure in our favour and are calling for -£1,030,000.00 

Collateral Posted -£3,030,000.00 
Valuation -£2,123,863.09 
Exposure -£906,136.91 
Margin call -£900,000.00 

Please can you confirm whether you agree and if so arrange for funds to be transferred advising on the value date. 

-----Original Message-----
From: XXXXXXX.XXXXX@XXXX.XXX <XXXXXXX.XXXXX@XXXX.XXX >
Sent: 22 August 2018 09:40
To: XXXXxxxx <XXXXXXX.XXXXX@XXXXX.XXX >; XXXXXXX.XXXXX@XXXX.XXX
Cc: XXXXXXX.XXXXX@XXXX.XXX
Subject: 148975 - [Type 3] Broker 4 vs. CGML : Margin Notice, Portfolio Statement
